aircraft.value: Sentinel-15 - AC-6311-282 at Sector East Station

defect_observed.value: Brake system pressure decay. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control Hydraulics component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

preventive_action.value: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 08/07/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 09/07/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 10/07/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 14/07/2023 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 18/07/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair
